values: Stubborn people don’t change their minds easily.
Both of my parents are stubborn. They never give in to each other.
adj. refusing to change your ideas or to stop doing something 固执的
adj. difficult to deal with, remove, etc. 难除去的
intractable
adj. 顽固的；顽强的；难处理的

- adj. 顽固的；固执的
- 难以移动、去除、医治等

比较级:  
stubborner，stubbornest 

副 词:  
stubbornly

名 词:  
stubbornness
adj. （人）固执的，倔强的；难以去除（对付，使用）的
顽固的， 执拗的， 倔强的； 难对付的， 难于克服的 (adj.)
adj. 顽固的；顽强的；难处理的
